products.title: Harriet Vintage Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Harriet vintage roman blind in cream/brown/multicoloured. Made to measure from 17.59 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Harriet, a beautiful bird themed pattern bursting with colour at a great price. 
 
This multicoloured roman blind is perfect to add a bird theme to any room in your home, the array of colours in the pattern means it will fit in with most decor.
 
 Product id: db-rom0741 fabric colour: vintage material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. products.title: Seaside, Vintage - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Seaside, vintage - roman blind the coastal vibe is bang on trend, and the seaside vintage takes the look to a new level, swapping classic blue tones for muted yellows and washed out reds. And the end result? A stunningly coloured and beautifully illustrat
products.productdescription: The coastal vibe is bang on trend, and the seaside vintage takes the look to a new level, swapping classic blue tones for muted yellows and washed out reds. And the end result? A stunningly coloured and beautifully illustrated roman blind with just a hint of the extraordinary about it.Theme your guest bedroom with a nautical vibe, surrounding the vintage with coolest blue or ice white walls, using the reds and yellows found in the blind to give the look some warmth with bedding, cushions, and wall art. Add in some shabby chic dcor and you're good to go!Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.
